How to Use
• Add to Chrome: Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to your toolbar.
• Sidebar: Click the top icon to quickly open AIPal's control panel in the browser sidebar.
• Minibar: Select text on a webpage, then click the floating button that appears below the text to activate the minibar with one click.
